Action to reproduce the exception

It seems we call close more than once on an input stream provided to
IFile.create(), and org.apache.tools.ant.util.ReaderInputStream (the superclass
for StringInputStream) does not like that. Even though the spec for #close()
does not say whether we can/cannot do that, most implementations handle
successive calls to #close() just fine.

Yes, this is a bug in the apache code:

http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=35544
